data.comment: The match is underway at Carrow Road.
Teemu Pukki puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 12, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Scott Kashket.
Ben Gibson (Norwich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Fred Onyedinma (Wycombe) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway at Carrow Road.
The home team replace Jordan Hugill with Adam Idah.
In the minute 68, Norwich make their second substitution with Mario Vrancic replacing Oliver Skipp.
Uche Ikpeazu is on a sub for Scott Kashket for Wycombe.
Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's second substitution at Carrow Road with Matt Bloomfield replacing Daryl Horgan.
In the minute 85, Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a third substitution, with Przemyslaw Placheta replacing Lukas Rupp.
Mario Vrancic scores to make it 2-1 at Carrow Road.
Adebayo Akinfenwa is replacing David Wheeler for the away team.
Adam Idah (Norwich) sees red and is sent off in Norwich!
